subject: Vam haptics
description_text:
Hi ive order ur simsonn plus x pedals including the optional basic vam for
3 pedals and it seems that im missing the cable for the psu

my order number is
#SSN5875

and my tracking number for the vam only is
YT2600900705679471 <http://www.yuntrack.com/Track/Detail/YT2600900705679471>

could u pls provide me the cable

regards
Daniel

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel,  ​​It has been found that your order will be shipped in two packages. Your power supply is expected to arrive around the 22nd. Please keep an eye out for it.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2600900705679471

yes i know and i have already recieved the vam motors but the cable is
still missing.

On Tue, 20 Jan 2026 at 3:17 PM, service@simsonn.com
